00055 class VTK_ESQUI_SCENARIO_EXPORT vtkToolEndovascular: public vtkTool {
00056 
00057 public:
00058 
00060     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkToolEndovascular,vtkTool);
00061 
00063     const char *GetClassName() {return "vtkToolEndovascular";}
00064 
00066     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00067 
00068 
00070 
00073     virtual void Init();
00074 
00076 
00079     void SetForceFeedback(float Force[]);
00080 
00082 
00087     void SetForceFeedback(float x, float y, float z) {
00088         this->ForceFeedback[0] = x;
00089         this->ForceFeedback[1] = y;
00090         this->ForceFeedback[2] = z;
00091     }
00092 
00094 
00098     void GetForceFeedback( float Force[] ) const
00099     {
00100         Force[0] = this->ForceFeedback[0];
00101         Force[1] = this->ForceFeedback[1];
00102         Force[2] = this->ForceFeedback[2];
00103     }
00104 
00106 
00110     float GetXFeedbackForce() {return this->ForceFeedback[0];}
00112 
00116     float GetYFeedbackForce() {return this->ForceFeedback[1];}
00118 
00122     float GetZFeedbackForce() {return this->ForceFeedback[2];}
00123 
00125     double * GetContactForceValue();
00126 
00127     // **** Geometrical Functions **** //
00129     virtual void SetDepth(double depth);
00130 
00132     virtual double GetDepth();
00133 
00135 
00140     virtual void AddDepth(double step);
00141 
00143 
00146     virtual void RotateX(double angle);
00147 
00149 
00152     virtual void RotateY(double angle);
00153 
00155 
00158     virtual void RotateZ(double angle);
00159 
00160 protected:
00161 
00162     vtkToolEndovascular();
00163     ~vtkToolEndovascular();
00164 
00166     double ForceFeedback[3];
00168     double Depth;
00170     double YawAngle;
00172     double PitchAngle;
00174     double RollAngle;
00175 
00176 private:
00177     vtkToolEndovascular (const vtkToolEndovascular &);
00178     void operator =(const vtkToolEndovascular &);
